Token.Abstract: TMMemoryCache is a fast, thread safe key/value store similar to NSCache. On iOS it will clear itself automatically to reduce memory usage when the app receives a warning or moves into the background.
A concurrent queue on which all work is done. It is exposed here so that it can be set to target some other queue, such as a global concurrent queue with a priority other than the default.
A concurrent queue on which all work is done. It is exposed here so that it can be set to target some other queue, such as a global concurrent queue with a priority other than the default.

The maximum number of seconds an object is allowed to exist in the cache. Setting this to a value greater than 0.0 will start a recurring GCD timer with the same period that calls trimToDate:. Setting it back to 0.0 will stop the timer. Defaults to 0.0.

The maximum number of seconds an object is allowed to exist in the cache. Setting this to a value greater than 0.0 will start a recurring GCD timer with the same period that calls trimToDate:. Setting it back to 0.0 will stop the timer. Defaults to 0.0.
A block to be executed just before an object is added to the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A block to be executed just before an object is added to the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A block to be executed just before an object is removed from the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A block to be executed just before an object is removed from the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A block to be executed just after an object is added to the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A block to be executed just after an object is added to the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A block to be executed just after an object is removed from the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A block to be executed just after an object is removed from the cache. This block will be excuted within a barrier, i.e. all reads and writes are suspended for the duration of the block.
A shared cache.
Retrieves the object for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block as soon as the object is available, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the queue.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the requested object.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently when the object is available.

Token.Abstract: Stores an object in the cache for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the object has been stored, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the queue.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object to store in the cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A key to associate with the object. This string will be copied.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the object has been stored, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes the object for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the object has been removed, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the queue.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object to be removed.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the object has been removed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache older than the specified date, as ordered by access time. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the cache has been trimmed, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the queue.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Objects that haven't been accessed since this date are removed from the cache.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the cache has been trimmed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache without calling the associated event blocks. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the cache has been cleared, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the queue.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the cache has been cleared, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the object for the specified key. This method blocks the calling the thread until the object is available.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The object for the specified key.

Token.Abstract: Stores an object in the cache for the specified key. This method blocks the calling the thread until the object has been stored.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object to store in the cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A key to associate with the object. This string will be copied.

Token.Abstract: Removes the object for the specified key. This method blocks the calling the thread until the object has been removed.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object to be removed.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache older than the specified date, as ordered by access time. This method blocks the calling the thread until the cache has been trimmed.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Objects that haven't been accessed since this date are removed from the cache.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache without calling the associated event blocks. This method blocks the calling the thread until the cache has been cleared.
